QuestData.Title: With Great Power, Comes Great Responsibility
QuestData.Description: <A voice like the sound of light bells rings in your head.>$B$BThe Mechanar employs my race's technology to create manacells, objects which provide great amounts of power.$B$BI need you to eliminate Mechano-Lord Capacitus so that Kael'thas' forces cannot harvest that power.
QuestData.PortraitTurnInText: Our work here is not yet complete.
QuestData.LogDescription: A'dal has asked you to slay Mechano-Lord Capacitus in the Mechanar of Tempest Keep.
QuestData.RewardText: You have done well, $n. But more work remains to be done.
